content: {"name": "Belmont Community Organization", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Food, clothing, medicine, heat and household items", "email": "", "url": "https://www.belmontcommunityorg.info/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "91 East Catawba Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Belmont", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28012", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.24066, "longitude": -81.02171109999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 825-4526", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Helps with income, rent, utility and food stamps"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once in 2 months"}]}
